Key Match Events: Warriors lost by 30 points to the Sacramento Kings, with a final score of 129-99
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Curry called out his team, stating that they 'aren't built' to come back from large deficits
Miscellaneous Highlights: Warriors are 6-14 in their last 20 games, with 7 of those losses by double figures
Stephen Curry is having a down year, averaging 22.5 points per game on 45.2 percent shooting from the field
Others: Warriors are struggling with a 11-plus man rotation, playmaking, and a precipitous dropoff in productivity from their vaunted sixth man Buddy Hield
